subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Greg Kraft shot a 70 to outlast Bo Van Pelt down the stretch, finishing at 14 under par for a one-shot victory at the inaugural Puerto Rico Open in Rio Grande for his first official PGA Tour victory. Jerry Kelly (70), at No. 63 the highest-ranked golfer at the event, and Van Pelt (72) were second at Trump International Golf Club. Kraft won the Deposit Guaranty Classic in Mississippi 15 years ago. Because it took place the same weekend as the Masters, it did not count as an official tour win.
